Text:
thanks so much for these! the show is awesome.
how soon will you be able to upload ep 4?
Where Are You Ekolb, missin those amazing uploads :(
Ekolb seems to missing in action... haven't seen upload anything in 5 days.. I hope you're ok, dude.
as above, your awesome posts are missed but hopefully all is well.. cheers

where r u ????????
hav u been busted ???????
i thort u was allowd to uplode TV stuff ?????????????
does this mean Ekolb was just 1 person ??????
anyway
sad.
COME BACKKKKKKKK

I am fine, I am sorry for disappearing without a word, but under circumstances I had no choice. My Dad passed away who lived in England, and I flew over there when he was sick and later passed away.  There is lot's to sort out, and I am sorry for not able to upload, but I will in very near future.  Sincerely Ekolb

my friend i am sorry to hear that.
you have my condolences.
be well and look after your selves
Sorry for your loss. Thanks for the uploads, great show.
